definition: to lose every scrap of reputation
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: He suffered a loss of prestige when the scandal was publicized .
sentences.chinese: 這件醜事公開後他便威信掃地。
